Question
========

Answerlist
----------
*  ${e}^{-12}\frac{12^5}{5!}$
*  $e^{-12}\frac{5^{12}}{12!}$
*  $\frac{5}{12}$
*  $e^{-5}\frac{5^{12}}{12!}$
*  $e^{-5}$
